participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Adventurous, humorous, and deeply connected to family values.
participant_1.background: I'm passionate about music and I'm always looking for new ways to express myself. I would have lunch with my brothers to thank them for their support. I am an army ranger. My mom went crazy when I was three and I have not seen her since.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative, friendly, and a bit rebellious when it comes to her parents.
participant_2.background: My cat was my best friend and I miss her every day. I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill. I’ve found other pretty good blogs to share opinions with. I sometimes lie to my parents about where I'm going so I can hang out with my boyfriend. I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

content.text: Hey I'm pretty interesting. Do you want to know more about me?
Sure, I'm excited to learn more about you!
I'm an army ranger and I'm passionate about music. I'm always looking for new ways to express myself. I would have lunch with my brothers to thank them for their support. What about you?

My cat was my best friend and I miss her every day. I'm excited to try new recipes with my George Foreman grill. I sometimes lie to my parents about where I'm going so I can hang out with my boyfriend. I want to write my own fairytales to share with my family and friends.

Oh I'm so sorry about your cat, that must be really tough. I love trying new recipes too! I'm not a good cook but I love to experiment in the kitchen. My mom went crazy when I was three and I've never seen her since.
I'm sorry to hear that about your mom. My parents are great but they can be really strict sometimes. I like to go out and have fun but they're always worried about me.
Well it sounds like you have a lot of interesting things going on in your life. I'm excited to get to know you better!
Thanks! You seem really cool too. I'd love to hang out sometime.
That would be great! Let's exchange numbers and we can plan something.
